00020 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_NEQ_H
00021 #define CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_NEQ_H
00022 
00023 #include "../constraints/constraint_equal.h"
00024 
00025 template<typename Var1, typename Var2>
00026 struct WatchNeqConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00027 {
00028   virtual string constraint_name()
00029   { return "WatchedNEQ"; }
00030   
00031   Var1 var1;
00032   Var2 var2;
00033 
00034   WatchNeqConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const Var1& _var1, const Var2& _var2) :
00035     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var1(_var1), var2(_var2)
00036   { }
00037   
00038   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00039   { return 2; }
00040   
00041   virtual void full_propagate()
00042   {  
00043     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00044     
00045       if(var1.isAssigned() && var2.isAssigned() && var1.getAssignedValue() == var2.getAssignedValue())
00046       {
00047         getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00048         return;
00049       }
00050       
00051       if(var1.isAssigned())
00052       {
00053         var2.removeFromDomain(var1.getAssignedValue());
00054         return;
00055       }
00056       
00057       if(var2.isAssigned())
00058       {
00059         var1.removeFromDomain(var2.getAssignedValue());
00060         return;
00061       }
00062       
00063     var1.addDynamicTrigger(dt    , Assigned);
00064     var2.addDynamicTrigger(dt + 1, Assigned);
00065   }
00066   
00067     
00068   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00069   {
00070       PROP_INFO_ADDONE(WatchNEQ);
00071       DynamicTrigger* dt_start = dynamic_trigger_start();
00072       
00073     D_ASSERT(dt == dt_start || dt == dt_start + 1);
00074     
00075       if(dt == dt_start)
00076       {
00077         D_ASSERT(var1.isAssigned());
00078         var2.removeFromDomain(var1.getAssignedValue());
00079       }
00080       else
00081       {
00082         D_ASSERT(var2.isAssigned());
00083         var1.removeFromDomain(var2.getAssignedValue());
00084       }
00085   }
00086   
00087   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00088   {
00089     D_ASSERT(v_size == 2);
00090     return v[0] != v[1];
00091   }
00092   
00093   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00094   { 
00095     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00096       vars.reserve(2);
00097     vars.push_back(var1);
00098     vars.push_back(var2);
00099     return vars;
00100   }
00101   
00102   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00103   {
00104     if(var1.isAssigned() && var2.isAssigned() && var1.getAssignedValue() == var2.getAssignedValue())
00105       return false;
00106     
00107     if(var1.isAssigned())
00108     {
00109       assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, var1.getAssignedValue()));
00110       if(var2.getMin() != var1.getAssignedValue())
00111         assignment.push_back(make_pair(1, var2.getMin()));
00112       else
00113         assignment.push_back(make_pair(1, var2.getMax()));
00114     }
00115     else
00116     {
00117       assignment.push_back(make_pair(1, var2.getMin()));
00118       if(var1.getMin() != var2.getMin())
00119         assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, var1.getMin()));
00120       else
00121         assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, var1.getMax()));
00122     }
00123     return true;
00124   }
00125 
00126   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00127   { return new EqualConstraint<Var1,Var2>(stateObj, var1, var2); }
00128 };
00129 
00130 template<typename VarArray1, typename VarArray2>
00131 AbstractConstraint*
00132 BuildCT_WATCHED_NEQ(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray1& _var_array_1, const VarArray2& _var_array_2, ConstraintBlob&)
00133 { 
00134   return new WatchNeqConstraint<typename VarArray1::value_type, typename VarArray2::value_type>
00135     (stateObj, _var_array_1[0], _var_array_2[0]); 
00136 }
00137 
00138 #endif
